mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Orders (user_id, delivery_address, status, total_price) VALUES (#{userId}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{status}, #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO Order_Detail (order_id, product_id, price, quantity) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Orders SET status = #{status}, updated_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, product_id, price, quantity FROM Order_Detail WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, o.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, o.delivery_address AS deliveryAddress, o.status AS status, o.total_price AS totalPrice, o.created_date AS createdDate, o.updated_date AS updatedDate FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN User u ON o.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY o.created_date DESC

SELECT -- 주문 기본 정보 o.order_id AS orderId, o.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, o.total_price AS totalPrice, o.status AS status, o.delivery_address AS deliveryAddress, o.created_date AS createdDate,
-- 주문 상세 정보 od.order_detail_id AS orderDetailId, od.product_id AS productId, od.price AS price, od.quantity AS quantity,
-- 상품 정보 p.product_name AS productName,
-- 상품 이미지 CONCAT('/uploads/', f.file_name) AS imageUrl
FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN User u ON o.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Order_Detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN Product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN File f ON p.product_id = f.product_id AND f.file_type = 0 -- 대표 이미지
WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY od.order_detail_id ASC;
